function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of adherence to social distancing regulations in institutional environments","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission and outbreaks","Mitigation":"Clear and consistent communication of social distancing guidelines, regular monitoring and enforcement of compliance","Technologies":"Digital monitoring systems, contact tracing apps, AI-powered crowd monitoring","People":"General public, employees of institutions, visitors to institutional environments","Owner":"Institutional management, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Provision of free masks by hair salons without adherence to health and safety regulations","Impact":"Risk of providing ineffective or non-compliant masks, leading to potential disease transmission","Mitigation":"Adherence to health and safety regulations when providing masks, ensuring the quality and compliance of masks provided","Technologies":"Quality control systems, health and safety monitoring tools","People":"Customers, employees of hair salons","Owner":"Hair salon management, regulatory authorities"},{"Description":"Theorizing and significant investment in brand meaning without clear economic justification","Impact":"Financial strain on the firm, potential loss of resources without tangible economic return","Mitigation":"Thorough cost-benefit analysis, market research to gauge the impact of brand investment, phased implementation to minimize financial risk","Technologies":"Market research tools, financial modeling software, performance tracking systems","People":"Firm management, shareholders, marketing and branding teams","Owner":"Firm management, financial advisors, marketing specialists"}]}
